projects.title: StockMonitor
projects.description: StockMonitor is a real-time stock tracking application that leverages AI and GraphQL to deliver live price updates, intelligent news summaries, and market insights with efficiency and clarity.

projects.title: BigBrain Therapy
projects.description: A responsive website built for BigBrain Therapy, a private mental health practice specializing in EMDR therapy, trauma recovery, ADHD, and anxiety treatment.

projects.title: BigBrainBlog
projects.description: A custom web application built to manage and publish blog articles for the BigBrain Therapy website, featuring user authentication and a responsive content management dashboard.

projects.title: Crypto Tracker
projects.description: A personal cryptocurrency portfolio tracker to monitor my invested coins and explore real-time prices of other cryptocurrencies.

projects.title: Ready Army
projects.description: An official U.S. Army website providing resources and guidance to help individuals and families prepare for emergencies, promoting readiness and resilience
